00052 class OSIMCOMMON_API Constant : public Function
00053 {
00054 //=============================================================================
00055 // MEMBER VARIABLES
00056 //=============================================================================
00057 protected:
00058     PropertyDbl _valueProp;
00059     double &_value;
00060

00063 //=============================================================================

00070         const std::string &aName="");
00071     Constant(const Constant &aSpline);
00072     virtual ~Constant();

00074     virtual void init(Function* aFunction);
00075

00080

00082     // OPERATORS
00083     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------

00087 #endif
00088 
00089     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00090     // SET AND GET
00091     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 public:
00093     virtual int getNumberOfPoints() const { return 0; }

00095     virtual double getY(int aIndex) const { return 0.0; }
00096     virtual double getZ(int aIndex) const { return 0.0; }
00097     virtual bool deletePoint(int aIndex) { return false; }
00098     virtual int addPoint(double aX, double aY) { return 0; }
00099     void setValue(double aValue) { _value = aValue; }
00100 
00101     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102     // EVALUATION
00103     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00104     virtual void updateBoundingBox();
00105     virtual double  evaluate(int aDerivOrder, double aX=0.0, double aY=0.0, double aZ=0.0) const { return _value; }
00106     double evaluate() { return _value; }
00107     virtual void scaleY(double aScaleFactor) { _value *= aScaleFactor; }
00108     const SimTK::Function<1>* createSimTKFunction() const;
